General.Name: Emro Inc.
General.Description: EMRO. Incorporated develops and provides purchase and supply management solutions. It offers SMARTsuite that provides an integrated solution for optimization on the entire purchasing value chain beyond general procurement process; and SMARTframework, a web based RIA technology that provides a workspace that maximizes user convenience to enhance system utilization and increase user's work efficiency. The company also provides professional consulting and master data management services. It serves electricity/electronics/semiconductor, steel/machine/heavy industry, automobile, shipbuilding/construction/chemical, IT/telecom/finance, and logistics service/distribution/other industries. EMRO. Incorporated was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: East Tower 5F(SK V1 Center), Seoul, South Korea, 150-806
